Nhìn chung việc quản lý tour của AZ rất tốt. Sự sắp xếp của họ đã đạt được mục tiêu nhưng sự hỗ trợ hướng dẫn của họ đến ngọn núi Black Virgin là vô vọng. Chúng tôi đã đặt chỗ cho 10 khách nhưng thật không may, một cặp đôi không thể đi cùng chúng tôi do vấn đề VISA. Tôi đã thông báo cho họ về điều này và yêu cầu sửa đổi cách sắp xếp cũng như chi phí như họ đã báo giá cho chúng tôi theo mỗi khách nhưng họ không xem xét điều đó với bất kỳ sự thông cảm nào. Ở mọi nơi, hướng dẫn viên của họ thường mua vé ăn tại chỗ và rõ ràng là cho 8 người chúng tôi chứ không phải 10 người và họ đã tiết kiệm được số tiền kha khá cho việc đó nhưng mặc dù có rất nhiều yêu cầu, họ vẫn gây áp lực buộc chúng tôi phải trả toàn bộ số tiền nếu không sẽ rút dịch vụ của họ. Cuối cùng, sau rất nhiều nỗ lực, họ chỉ hoàn lại số tiền 30 USD cho cặp đôi mất tích. Đây có thể là phương thức hoạt động của họ nhưng tôi không thích nó vì nó thể hiện sự thờ ơ của họ đối với khách du lịch và không hợp lý, khi bạn tiết kiệm được ít nhất 70-80, hướng dẫn của họ về phần Sài Gòn thật vô ích và lãng phí rất nhiều thời gian của chúng tôi vì vậy chúng tôi đã bỏ lỡ nhiều SS hơn. Hướng dẫn viên Đà Nẵng Kelly rất giỏi và việc sắp xếp đất đai cũng tốt. Cảm ơn chuyến tham quan địa phương của Team AZ nhưng tôi sẽ không giới thiệu bạn với những du khách khác.Đọc thêm

Hi Dr Sanjeev from India, thank you for your feedback and sharing your thoughts about your experience traveling with us. Maybe, your case is very special to us, even though a year has passed, we can not forget this experiences with you .It was really hard situation for us. Although it was all the kindness and effort we could have done to help you at the time, it was probably not truly understood and received on your part. However, all opinions are received and welcomed by azlocal trip to bring an objective view to everyone and visitors to us. And here are some more shares to help you and other travelers have a more positive view, better understand this situation and have better experience in arranging a trip to Vietnam with us or anyone else : 

1 If you research carefully, whether you go with us or with any other company, whatever service you book, whether you go in a private group or a share group, you are completely responsible and must pay 100 of the cost for not showing up as planned or canceling booking on the last mins . This is also a general policy clearly written in all orders from us and the operating parties in Vietnam. Please check it if need.

2 Your cancellation requested time is close to 1am at midnight and everything is ready to pick you up at 7am in the morning. Thank you for notifying us to know in the middle of the night but please understand because we are the impossibility of working through the night like youd like, and no one really connecting that late at night here to reply back you on the same time.

3 Your trip is a PRIVATE TRIP for only your group not a share group trip with other travelers. If 10 people book a tour and 2 people dont show up, it wont save us as much money as you thought because even though youre going with 8 people, all the services were the same group 10 pax like transport  carcable etc , the tour guide,  etc. will still remain the same as the booking for a group of 10 people and must still operate as planned except for some ticket sales points and restaurants who accepted to assist you in canceling last mins for you. We also gave you the refunds right on trip which we got from our operators. Therefore, using the service for a group of 10 people with private tour but requiring payment for only 8 people and still want to use the same services tour 10 pax is completely unreasonable in this case. Please understand.

3 No show on tour and visa error are incidents that no one wants and come from careless preparation on the part of your side.  We were very understanding about that, so we actually spent a lot of time helping you fix that problem together with you , I believe you also saw clearly our effort during each moments. Each operators have own each limits and your tour cancellation is too sudden and your wishes are beyond our scope and limits. We hope you accepted and understand in this cases.

4 In your case, if you cancel about 6-7 hours before the trip and cancel in the middle of the night, supporting you to get back about 30 of the total cost is all kindness, sincerity and kindness, effort from our side for you. And this partial refund to you is our favor and understanding and our best efforts for you, and actually it is not our responsibility. We made it clear to you from the beginning.

5 As you shared that you have researched about 5-7 companies before placing an order with us, then surely the service cost from us you ordered is very reasonable, and you choose us because of trust and care. So how can we save 70 - 80 of the cost as you said while we have helped you refund all the costs of entrance tickets and food for 2 your friends and we still have to pay for private car and guide even 8 or 10 is still the same for private group. Please notes : we are not here to try to earn from you and make trouble for you, we are here to be useful for our travelers.

During the tour, we really tried our best to do our roles and responsibilities well to make the trip go smoothly and ensure the entire service was as per your order of 10 people even though the other two didnt show on last mins. We have made this situation very clear to you and hope you will pay attention and sympathize. This is an unfortunate incident for both you and us and we have tried to resolve it to the best of our ability because i know that we only can run our bussiness in the long term when our travelers are happy with our services.

Finally, thank you for your comments and wish you and your family good health, luck and smooth trips next time you come to Vietnam. We hope you will find some one who is more suitable support person than us on the next time and we are always here to support you whenever you need it even you go with anyone, are not us. Thanks for your feedback. Best wishes for you.Read more
